body.usage: UI text, inputs, data visualization, long form content

rules: Headings must use tight tracking (-0.02em) for a modern editorial feel.
Body text should have relaxed line-height (1.6) for readability.
Use 'font-light' (300) for large display text to feel airy and elegant.

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

MoodCard.style: bg-white rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-soft border border-neutral-100 hover:shadow-float transition-all duration-300

Button.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium hover:bg-primary/90 transition-colors shadow-lg shadow-primary/20
Button.secondary: bg-white text-primary border border-primary/20 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium hover:bg-primary/5 transition-colors

MusicPlayer.style: fixed bottom-8 right-8 z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/50 rounded-full p-2 pr-6 shadow-float flex items-center gap-4

EmotionSelector.item: flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-6 rounded-2xl bg-neutral-100 hover:bg-secondary/20 cursor-pointer transition-all border-2 border-transparent hover:border-secondary data-[state=checked]:border-secondary data-[state=checked]:bg-secondary/30

meditation_bg.usage: Background for breathing exercises or waiting screens

abstract_accent.usage: Decorative element in cards or sidebars

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/fraunces' and '@fontsource/manrope' to package.json immediately.
SETUP TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the specific colors and border radius defined above.
NO SHARP EDGES: Ensure all cards and inputs have 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-2xl'.
ORGANIC FEEL: Use the 'noise' texture overlay on the main background to avoid a flat digital look.
MUSIC PLAYER: Implement the music player as a persistent layout element (in the Layout wrapper).
CHARTS: Use 'Recharts' with custom gradients (Sage Green to transparent). Hide grid lines for a cleaner look.
FORMS: Break the mood assessment into a multi-step wizard (one question per screen) to reduce cognitive load.
AI RESPONSE: Format the AI guidance in a 'Letter' style card, using the Serif font for the body text to feel personal.
universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
All interactive elements must have data-testid.
